channel.title: Changing "The Look"
channel.description:
Hey guys i want my server to be a semi decent server and not everyone knows about ::char command so when [b][u]NEW[/u][/b] players log in i want the change you look screen to pop up like in the actual rs2 i know i saw a tut on it but i guess it got deleted cuz i've been searching like a mad man lol so if you could gimme a link to the tut or just post the tut that'd be the best thanks guys! :D
~o m g
